amendment.description: To permanently extend a moratorium on the treatment of a certain facility as an institution for mental diseases, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1075 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1075 proposed by Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S8515-8516; text: CR S8515-8516) To permanently extend a moratorium on the treatment of a certain facility as an institution for mental diseases, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1075 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
